sys_script.name: Calculate Fee ALTEVERSION

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_23d496b51b791910b342dc61ab4bcbe0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_sigh_ausleihsyst_renting</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_sigh_ausleihsyst_renting">returned=0^dateend<javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()^EQ<item display_value="Rented" endquery="false" field="returned" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="0"/><item endquery="false" field="dateend" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="<" or="false" value="javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate Fee ALTEVERSION</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	
 var gr = new GlideRecord ("x_sigh_ausleihsyst_renting");
	//gr.addQuery('user', current.user);
	gr.addQuery('fee', current.fee);
	gr.query();
	
	if(gr.next()){ 
		
  var today = new GlideDateTime();
  var end = new GlideDateTime();
  end.setValue(current.dateend);
//berechnet Tage nach DateEnd die fällig sind
  var diff = GlideDateTime.subtract(end, today);
  var days = diff.getRoundedDayPart();


	gr.setValue('fee', 0.20 * days);
    // gr.fee = 0.20 *days;
   
    gr.update();



	


}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>selma.ouahab@alumni.fh-aachen.de</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-08 13:21:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>23d496b51b791910b342dc61ab4bcbe0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>67</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Fee ALTEVERSION</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AusleihSystem" source="x_sigh_ausleihsyst">ce31d7851b35d5107165fdd49b4bcb87</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AusleihSystem">ce31d7851b35d5107165fdd49b4bcb87</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_23d496b51b791910b342dc61ab4bcbe0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-13 13:34:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=23d496b51b791910b342dc61ab4bcbe0"/></record_update>
